name: openmanager-rule-engine
description: Rule Engine Function - 규칙 기반 빠른 응답 전문 Function

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy rule-engine --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 256MB --timeout 30s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.deploy:health: gcloud functions deploy rule-engine-health --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 128MB --timeout 10s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.logs: gcloud functions logs read rule-engine --region asia-northeast3
